entry.title: Vagrant could not detect VirtualBox!
entry.content:
if you run into this error

</p>

<p>=====================================================================
Vagrant experienced an error!</p>

<p>Vagrant could not detect VirtualBox! Make sure VirtualBox is properly installed.
If VirtualBox is installed, it may be an incorrect version. Vagrant currently</p>

<h1>requires VirtualBox 3.2.x. Please install the proper version to continue.</h1>

<p>

Know ye! that you may be using an older version of vagrant...

Solution is to do gem install vagrant -v='0.8.8' or edit your Gemfile to include gem 'vagrant', '=0.8.8'

hope that helps..
